name: Go! Go! Roboto!!
description:
A little robot navigates a toy factory she used to call home, searching energy sources to not run out of power.

This game was made in 3 hours for the game jam Trijam #199. By the rules, each of us spent less than 3 hours making the game. All graphics, code, music and sound effects were made within that time.

Made By:

Robbie (@robertbegg_art)   -   art

Suliac   -   music and sound effects

Tollgnoll (Ivan Shestakov)   -   programming

How to Play:

You control a robot. Try to get to the end of the level (go right). However, the robot is quickly running out of energy. Keep collecting batteries to refill your energy and keep playing. Jumping takes more energy, so don't jump without reason!

A and D or arrow keys to move

W, space or up arrow to jump

The Theme "Energy":

Trijam #199 had a theme: Energy. Go Go Roboto is about a robot who is constantly running out of energy and needs to collect batteries to stay alive.
